data.name: Voidwalkers: The Gates Of Hell (Hell's Dungeon)
data.detailed_description: Purchase this DLC package to add a new level to your game. Enter Hell's Dungeon and travel through a new experience. Crawl through a series of endless dungeons, hack the terminals, and destroy any zombies that cross your path!
data.about_the_game: Purchase this DLC package to add a new level to your game. Enter Hell's Dungeon and travel through a new experience. Crawl through a series of endless dungeons, hack the terminals, and destroy any zombies that cross your path!
data.short_description: Purchase this DLC package to add a new level to your game. Enter Hell's Dungeon and travel through a new experience. Crawl through a series of endless dungeons, hack the terminals, and destroy any zombies that cross your path!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB / GTX 1050 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40 GHz - 3.70 GHZ (Or equivalent AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 (Or equivalent AMD GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB / GTX 1050 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850.
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.04
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-2600 CPU @ 3.40 GHz - 3.70 GHZ (Or equivalent AMD CPU)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 (Or equivalent AMD GPU)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Voidwalkers: The Gates Of Hell (Hell's Dungeon)

content_descriptors.notes: You progress through the game by destroying as many zombies as possible. You can blow off the limbs of the zombies which is violent and contains gore.
